discourse_list.title: CES Update: October, November and end of 2022 Forecast

content.content: Disclaimer: Information published below represents the official position of the Collateral Engineering Core Unit as a team.  TL;DR October and November  CES delivered the spells required for MIP65 to fulfill the 250M debt ceiling and the further increase to 500M and some other housekeeping activities. We also supported Monetalis on minting the first DAI draw downs in the test transactions.  rETH was onboarded successfully with Debt ceiling set to 0, and later raised the DC in a secondary spell. CES coordinated with Coinbase engineers and legal members on a smart contrat solution “safe box”. Coinbase has provided changes to the contract. A lessons learned forum post was shared summarizing RWA improvements CES handed over RWA reporting duties to Strategic Finance.  Forecast for rest of year  MIP81 Coinbase Institutional Rewards technical assessment on the smart contract solution and a more traditional solution will be published in the upcoming week. GUSD rewards solution has been agreed with Strategic Finance and Protocol Engineering, a code review is taking place and deployment of the contracts and a Technical Assessment detailing the solution is planned for the week of Dec 5th. DEC 9th Executive content for collateral related topics will include  GNO onboarding Blocktower/Centrifuge 4 vaults onboarding renBTC offboarding.   CES continues to facilitate the CSI Monday meetings and the Collateral Management Monthly meetings.   CU Management & Operations The following Budget updates where provided by the previous facilitator  Published the Oct 2022 Budget Summary  Published the Nov 2022 Budget Summary  Published the Final 2022 Budget Summary    Previous Sprint Updates  CES Sprint Update #1 (2022/Q1 - Jan 31st to Feb 11th 2022) CES Sprint Update #2 (2022/Q1 - Feb 14th to Feb 25th 2022)  CES Sprint Update #3 (2022/Q1 - Feb 28th to Mar 11th 2022) CES Sprint Update #4 (2022/Q1 - Mar 14th to Mar 25th 2022) CES April 2022 Update CES May 2022 Update CES June 2022 Update CES July and August 2022 Update CES Sept 2022 Update  Questions❔ Join our Discord and engage with us! JOIN NOW
